label: Scene : Show the Inspector
insertText: scene.debugLayer.show();

label: Scene : Setup a shadow generator
insertText:
var shadowGenerator = new BABYLON.ShadowGenerator(${1:1024}, ${2:light});
shadowGenerator.useExponentialShadowMap = true;

label: Scene : Setup a Skybox
Scene : Setup a lens flare system
Scene : Setup audio in the scene
insertText: var music = new BABYLON.Sound("Violons", "sounds/violons11.wav", scene, null, {loop: true, autoplay: true});

label: Scene : Setup a Sprite System
Add Camera : Arc Rotate Camera w/Radians
insertText:
var camera = new BABYLON.ArcRotateCamera("${1:camera}", ${2:0}, ${3:1}, ${4:10}, ${5:BABYLON.Vector3.Zero()}, scene);
camera.attachControl(canvas, true);

label: Add Camera : Arc Rotate Camera w/Degrees
insertText:
var camera = new BABYLON.ArcRotateCamera("${1:camera}", BABYLON.Tools.ToRadians(${2:0}), BABYLON.Tools.ToRadians(${3:57.3}), ${4:10}, ${5:BABYLON.Vector3.Zero()}, scene);
camera.attachControl(canvas, true);

label: Add Camera : Free Camera
Add Camera : WebXR Camera
Add Light : Hemispheric light
insertText: var light = new BABYLON.HemisphericLight("${1:hemiLight}", new BABYLON.Vector3(${2:0}, ${3:1}, ${4:0}), scene);

label: Add Light : Directional light
insertText:
var light = new BABYLON.DirectionalLight("${1:dirLight}", new BABYLON.Vector3(${2:-1},${3:-2},${4:-1}), scene);
light.position = new BABYLON.Vector3(${5:4},${6:8},${7:4});

label: Add Light : Point light
insertText:
var light = new BABYLON.PointLight("${1:pointLight}", new BABYLON.Vector3(${2:2},${3:4},${4:2}), scene);
light.position = new BABYLON.Vector3(${5:4},${6:8},${7:4});

label: Add Light : Spot light
insertText: var light = new BABYLON.SpotLight("spotLight", new BABYLON.Vector3(-Math.cos(Math.PI/6), 4 , -Math.sin(Math.PI/6)), new BABYLON.Vector3(0, -1, 0), Math.PI / 4, 1.5, scene);

label: Add Light : Spot lights (3 colors)
Build a ground plane
insertText: var ground = BABYLON.MeshBuilder.CreateGround("${1:ground}", {width: ${2:6}, height: ${3:6}}, scene);

label: Build a sphere
insertText:
var sphere = BABYLON.MeshBuilder.CreateSphere("${1:sphere}", {diameter: ${2:2}}, scene);
sphere.position.y = 1;

label: Build a box
insertText:
var box = BABYLON.MeshBuilder.CreateBox("${1:box}", {size: ${2:2}}, scene);
box.position.y = 1;

label: Build a cylinder
insertText:
var cylinder = BABYLON.MeshBuilder.CreateCylinder("${1:cylinder}", {height: ${2:2}, diameter: ${3:1}}, scene);
cylinder.position.y = 1;

label: Import a Mesh
insertText:
BABYLON.SceneLoader.ImportMesh("${1:meshName}", "${2:url/to/parent/directory}", "${3:fileName.fileExtension}", scene, function(newMeshes){

});

label: Load from Snippet : Node Material
Load from Snippet : GUI
insertText:
let advancedTexture = BABYLON.GUI.AdvancedDynamicTexture.CreateFullscreenUI("${1:name}", true, scene);
let loadedGUI = advancedTexture.parseFromSnippetAsync("${2:I59XFB#11}");
